entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
